channel.title: I need help with my unfinished server
channel.description:
I need to know the following:
1. How to change the Welcome messages (solved) 2. How to change magic book teleport locations (solved) 3. How to make some sort of teleporting ring/amulet to teleport you to a certain place if your player rights are >1 and a different place if they are >2 (making a mod and admin island) For the coords- please just put x and y I can fill them in later :) 4. How to place objects at certain positions (trying to block off exits to a city) (solved)
Any help would be great !

item.title: I need help with my unfinished server
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

heres the one for mod island:

if(itemID == mod amulet ID) && playerRights == 1) { triggerTele(x coord, y coord, 0); }

heres the one for admin island:

if(itemID == admin amulet ID) && playerRights == 2) { triggerTele(x coord, y coord, 0); }

you gotta modify it with the coords and the IDs, other thent hat, i did it for you

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my unfinished server

thanks, and i edited the original post

item.title: I need help with my unfinished server
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

  1. client.java, ctrl + f, type in message you already get, and modify it to what you wish
  2. clickingmost.java get coords of where you already are after the teleport you wish to change it, and type those in clickingmost.java then change the coords to where you wish.
  3. your asking for to much here, give more detail like which coordinates
  4. client.java, public void NewObjects() {

I wont spoonfeed, so post further problems here, and cross out/erase the problems that are already solved

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my unfinished server

Read full topic
